Instantly.AddIRCMessage: @channel, My scanner shows that 58 ransom files are active, well done everybody, I think we've bombed the whole place
Yeah, that's supposed to be all of them
We'll wait. I notified the client. Waiting for further instructions
We can kill them all right now if you want to attract everybody's attention, including Omicron
I didn't say I want to kill those people
And that is why you placed ransomware to extort a hospital. You have a pretty bendable morality, Vortex
But it would be better if you hadn't got it at all, it makes you weak
You want to win over Omicron? You've got to be strong, no remorse and second thoughts
Don't let anyone stop you on your path

That is our group's philosophy. And that is exact reason why we have such power and connections. We decide fate of people, would they live or die. Fear is our weapon. You can't scare a person with big words, you have to act
I bet Omicron knows that. He plays on the same rules
You want to find and fight him? Then prove that you've got balls!
